CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 自从；从…以后；自…以后；从…以来；（表示气愤）何曾；什么时候
既然；鉴于；因为；由于；从…以后；自…以来
从那时起；此后；以后；之后；自…以后；从…起；从…开始；从…以来

synonym.mean: 因为；由于；既然；自…以来；自…以后

word_mean_info__list.difference: 从属连词，语意强，着重直接的原因或理由，所引出的从句是全句的重心，用以回答why提出的问题。
并列连词，语气较弱，所引出的句子一般放在后面，表示附带说明的理由或推断理由。
从属连词，语意较because, since弱，着重在主句，所表示的原因或理由是“附带的”。
语意比because弱，但比as强，一般用于表示“由于大家已知的事实”。

word_group.brief_definition: 此后一直, 自…以来直至现在

word_group.phrase: be the best thing since sliced bread
be the greatest thing since sliced bread

word_group.brief_definition: 自那时以来；尔后；自那时起
长久以来；长时间以来；从前

bilingual.source: Since she was born she hasn't spoken a word.
bilingual.target: 自从她出生以来，她一句话也没说过。

bilingual.source: Hey! I haven't heard from you since you left.
bilingual.target: 嘿！自从你离开后我就没收到你的消息。

bilingual.source: I haven't done much exercise since I got my computer.
bilingual.target: 自从我有了电脑后，我没怎么运动。

bilingual.source: How have you changed since you started junior high school?
bilingual.target: 自从你上初中以来你有什么变化？

bilingual.source: The world turned upside down since the invention.
bilingual.target: 自从发明以来，世界发生了翻天覆地的变化。

bilingual.source: Technology has really changed since my grandma was young.
bilingual.target: 自从我奶奶年轻时，科技真的改变了很多。

bilingual.source: Advertising has changed a lot since the first advert.
bilingual.target: 自从第一个广告以来，广告已经发生了很大变化。

bilingual.source: Since he has had a new teacher, he has quickly improved.
bilingual.target: 自从他有了新老师，他进步很快。

bilingual.source: Since he started riding a bike, he has not had a cold.
bilingual.target: 自从他开始骑自行车，他就没有感冒过。

bilingual.source: I have not done much exercise since I got my computer last year.
bilingual.target: 自从去年有了电脑，我就没怎么锻炼了。

list.abstract: since，英语单词，副词adv（常用于现在完成时或过去完成时），介词prep.（常用于现在完成时或过去完成时）自···以来，从···至今，自从，连接词conj。

yingyinNormal.en: But, everything is different now. Since we moved.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可是，自从我们搬到这里后，一切都不一样了。

yingyinNormal.en: And since Hunley shut us down, they've been escalating unchecked.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从亨利解散了我们部门后，这个组织就越加猖狂。

yingyinNormal.en: Have you felt that at all? Since you became a mother?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你有过这种感觉吗，自从你成为母亲？

yingyinNormal.en: Ever since I broke my nose I've never had a sense of smell!
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从我摔断鼻子后，就闻不到味道了！

yingyinNormal.en: You keep your voice down. You have had a bug up your ass since you showed up here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小点声，你自从回来就一直在大喊大叫。

yingyinNormal.en: Ever since you took that position, you talk as if you run the place.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从你接受了那职位，你语气就像是管事的一样。

yingyinNormal.en: How long has Polly been sick? Since we came out on our boat trip.
yingyinNormal.zh: 波利生病有多长时间了？自从我们驾船出来游玩开始。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr Carson, they've been testing the system since the Romans left.
yingyinNormal.zh: 卡森先生，自从罗马人离开，社会就一直在经受考验。

yingyinNormal.en: You mean since gossip girl published pictures of him and some skank?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是说自从"八卦天后"公开了他和某个女人的照片？

yingyinNormal.en: Muggle? Non-magic folk. This boy's had his name down ever since you were born.
yingyinNormal.zh: 麻瓜？不懂魔法的人，这孩子自从你出生之前就注册了。

yingyinNormal.en: So, will you start riding the bus again? I don't know. I haven't been up there since...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你以后还会坐校车吗? 我也说不好，自从上次...

yingyinNormal.en: Since Amy and I have been living together, we've been bickering like my parents used to.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从我和艾米住同居后，就一直像我父母以前那样争吵。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, don't feel bad. I think we've all been distracted since the girls entered our lives.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别难过了，我觉得自从我们的生活有了女人后，我们都分心了。

yingyinNormal.en: Things have gotten a lot worse since you left Bikini Bottom. Or should I say Planktopolis.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从你们离开比基尼岛事情变得很严重了。普兰克统治了一切。

yingyinNormal.en: I haven't seen you since your party. Someone said you left crying. How are you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从派对之后，我就没见过你了，听说你是哭着离开的，最近过得好吗？

yingyinNormal.en: But honestly, since you've been back, I've, wondered if your mind was even on college.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但老实讲，自从你回来后，我一直在想 你是否还记得上大学这事。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, what is going on? Well, ever since Amy started working with Howard, she hasn't been home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 到底怎么了？自从艾米开始和霍华德一起工作，她就没回过家。

yingyinNormal.en: I haven't seen him this stuck since he tried to figure out the third Matrix movie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 自从他尝试理清《黑客帝国》第三部之后我就没见过他能卡成这个样子。

yingyinNormal.en: You were a partner in a top firm. Yes. And I can't get a job since the scandal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你曾是顶尖律所的合伙人。没错，但自从那个丑闻之后我就找不到工作了。

yingyinNormal.en: Sorry? I've been dreaming about going to the Large Hadron Collider since I was nine years old.
yingyinNormal.zh: 抱歉？我自从九岁起就一直梦想着有朝一日去看大型强子对撞机。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I've found quite a few, and—<highlight>since</highlight> I started posting them on Twitter—they have been causing quite a stir.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我发现了很多，而且——自从我开始在推特上发布它们——它们已经引起了不小的轰动。

examination_example.sentence: By most measures, corporate governance has become a lot tighter and more rigorous <highlight>since</highlight> the 1970s.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从大多数指标来看，自20世纪70年代以来，公司治理变得更加严格。

examination_example.sentence: I've been able to do this <highlight>since</highlight> I was four.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我自从四岁开始就能做到这一点。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> weight loss is not my goal, it is less important for me to track my weight each week.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为减肥不是我的目标，所以每周跟踪体重对我来说不太重要。

examination_example.sentence: The ruling is a victory for big chains with a presence in many states, <highlight>since</highlight> they usually collect sales tax on online purchases already.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这项裁决对在许多州都有业务的大型连锁店来说是一次胜利，因为他们通常已经对网上购物征收销售税了。

examination_example.sentence: Now we can understand each other's positions and recognize our shared values, <highlight>since</highlight> we both care about needy workers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在我们可以理解彼此的立场，并认识到我们共同的价值观，因为我们都关心贫困的工人。

word_usage.usage:
表示“（时间）持续”时，since和for都可与表示时间的词连用。
(1) for后跟一段时间，表示某事进行了多长时间，
例：She slept for eight hours. 她睡了8个小时。
(2) since后多接某一时间点，表示某事开始的时间。
例：She has been with the group since it began. 这个集团创建之初她就在那里工作。

表示“因为”时：
since：当所述原因是已知的客观事实或被当作推断的理由时用since，语气略强于 as。
because：语气最强，表因果关系，通常用来回答由why引导的疑问句。由because引导的分句置于句首时，须用逗号与主句隔开，置于句末时则不用隔开。如所述理由是明显或已知的，则用as较because更为合适。
for：属于并列连词，由它引导的分句表示补充说明性的理由，通常只能置于句末，且必须用逗号与前面的分句隔开。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自...以来直至现在

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Ever <highlight>since</highlight> America's colonial days, the Caribbean islands have been favorite places to visit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从美国殖民时期以来，加勒比群岛一直是人们最喜欢去的地方。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> World War Ⅱ, tourism has increased rapidly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二战以来，旅游业迅速增长。

examination_example.sentence: The growth in public agricultural research spending peaked in the 1970s and has been shrinking ever <highlight>since</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公共农业研究支出的增长在20世纪70年代达到顶峰，此后一直在萎缩。

examination_example.sentence: Joseph's top priority became getting his hands on enough grass-fed milk to keep customers satisfied, <highlight>since</highlight> his own 64-cow herd wasn't going to suffice.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Joseph 的当务之急是获得足够的草饲牛奶来让顾客满意，因为他自己的64头奶牛群还不够用。

examination_example.sentence: Best Buy has been bearing the lion's share of e-waste volume <highlight>since</highlight> its largest competitors do not have their own recycling programs.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于它最强劲的对手们都没有自己的回收项目，百思买在电子垃圾回收项目中一直扮演着“领头羊”的角色。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> the former (acquaintances) is most common among those inclined towards indifferent relationships, their predominance can bolster individuals' sense of self-worth.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为前者(熟人)更多的是“冷漠关系”的拥护者，这一优势有助于增强个体的自我价值感。

examination_example.sentence: Especially <highlight>since</highlight> journalism is one job robots will never do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 特别是由于新闻业是机器人将永远做不到的工作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> a change in the course of action can sometimes be important and lead to a positive outcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为行动过程中的改变有时是重要的，能带来积极的结果。

examination_example.sentence: At this time there is nothing to take action on <highlight>since</highlight> the analysis has yet to be completed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于尚未完成分析，因此目前没有采取任何行动。

examination_example.sentence: She has <highlight>since</highlight> worked with another high-profile, luxury label.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此后，她又与另一家知名奢侈品牌合作。

examination_example.sentence: Social networks, though, have <highlight>since</highlight> colonized the web for television's values.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，社交网络从此为电视的价值开拓了网络。

word_usage.usage:
since+时间点，表示“自从...时候开始”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：I have stayed in that country since 1995. 
从1995年以来，我就在那个国家了。

since+一段时间+ago，表示“从...时间以前”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：They have lived in that house since two years ago. 
两年前他们就住在那座房子里了。

since+从句，表示“从...以来”，要求主句谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词；从句谓语动词用一般过去时，而且是终止性动词。
示例：Lily has stayed at home since she left school. 
莉莉离开学校之后就一直呆在家里。

It is/ has been +一段时间+since从句，意为“自从……以来已经（多久）了”。
示例： It has been three months since he moved to this city. 
他搬到这个城市已经三个月了。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自...以来直至现在

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Schools and teachers have consistently reported the scale of the problem <highlight>since</highlight> 2009.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自2009年以来，学校和教师一直在报告问题的严重程度。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> the beginning of this century, an increasing amount of time has been shifted in public schools from recess to academic activities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自本世纪初以来，公立学校越来越多的时间从课间休息转移到学术活动上。

examination_example.sentence: Well, ever <highlight>since</highlight> Sandra left the department, I feel like I've been targeted to do all her work, as well as mine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从桑德拉离开了这个部门，我觉得除了我自身的工作外，我还承担了她的工作量。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> my overall style was quite minimal, I thought and hoped a whole renovation wouldn't be too difficult.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于我的整体风格非常简单，我认为并希望整个翻新不会太难。

examination_example.sentence: Most of them engage with potential donors, <highlight>since</highlight> projects that answered questions from interested donors fared better. And they target a small amount of money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们中的大多数都与潜在捐助者进行接触，因为回答感兴趣的捐助者问题的项目进展得更好。并且他们的目标金额不多。

examination_example.sentence: The researchers argued that breakfast helps reduce daily calorie intake and improve the quality of our diet — <highlight>since</highlight> breakfast foods are often higher in fibre and nutrients.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员认为，早餐有助于减少每日卡路里的摄入量，改善我们的饮食质量，因为早餐吃的东西往往含有更高的纤维含量和营养成分。

examination_example.sentence: We haven't heard from him <highlight>since</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 后来我们就没有他的消息了。

examination_example.sentence: A vertical solar project on such a large scale has never been repeated <highlight>since</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如此大规模的垂直太阳能项目从那以后再也没有出现过。

word_usage.usage:
It is/ has been +一段时间+since从句，意为“自从……以来已经（多久）了”。
示例： It has been three months since he moved to this city. 
他搬到这个城市已经三个月了。

since+从句，表示“从...以来”，要求主句谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词；从句谓语动词用一般过去时，而且是终止性动词。
示例：Lily has stayed at home since she left school. 
莉莉离开学校之后就一直呆在家里。

since+时间点，表示“自从...时候开始”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：I have stayed in that country since 1995. 
从1995年以来，我就在那个国家了。

since+一段时间+ago，表示“从...时间以前”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：They have lived in that house since two years ago. 
两年前他们就住在那座房子里了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> I was a kid, I`ve considered different jobs I would like to do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我还是个孩子的时候，我就考虑过做不同的工作。

examination_example.sentence: It's been three weeks <highlight>since</highlight> he first started going, so Macy and I are pretty used to it now.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 距离他第一次离开已经有三周了，所以梅西和我现在已经很习惯了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> 1958, they have been recognized as the national theatre of Israel.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自1958年以来，它们被公认为以色列的国家剧院。

examination_example.sentence: We haven't had any guests <highlight>since</highlight> we moved in here.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自从我们搬进来后，家里就没有客人来拜访。

examination_example.sentence: So a common language is required and in postcrossing that's English <highlight>since</highlight> it's widely spoken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有我们需要一种通用的语言，在postcrossing网站中就是指英语，因为它被广泛使用。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> the effects were small, this may suggest that our creative thinking does not differ that much.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于效果很微小，这可能表明我们的创造性思维没有太大差异。

examination_example.sentence: Unfortunately, you must carry the necessary equipment with you, <highlight>since</highlight> it's all but impossible to find natural substitutes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不幸的是，你必须随身携带必要的设备，因为几乎不可能找到天然的替代品。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 此后一直；自…以来直至现在

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Since</highlight> it will be rainy tomorrow, we have to choose a different time to go jogging．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 由于明天会下雨，我们必须选择其他时间去慢跑。

examination_example.sentence: However, <highlight>since</highlight> we now live in a worldwide society, people's views about beauty are always changing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，由于我们现在生活在一个全球化的社会中，人们对美的看法总是在变化。

examination_example.sentence: Valentine's Day has nothing to do with me <highlight>since</highlight> I am a single dog.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情人节与我无关，因为我是单身狗。

examination_example.sentence: Life hasn't changed much for cowboys <highlight>since</highlight> the early days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从早期开始，牛仔的生活就没有太大改变。

examination_example.sentence: You've been learning words <highlight>since</highlight> you were a tiny baby.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你从很小的时候就开始学习单词了。

examination_example.sentence: Bob and Jim have been good friends <highlight>since</highlight> they joined the same tennis team．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 鲍勃和吉姆自从加入同一个网球队以来就是好朋友。

word_usage.usage:
since+时间点，表示“自从...时候开始”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：I have stayed in that country since 1995. 
从1995年以来，我就在那个国家了。

since+一段时间+ago，表示“从...时间以前”，要求谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词。
示例：They have lived in that house since two years ago. 
两年前他们就住在那座房子里了。

since+从句，表示“从...以来”，要求主句谓语动词用现在完成时，而且必须是延续性动词；从句谓语动词用一般过去时，而且是终止性动词。
示例：Lily has stayed at home since she left school. 
莉莉离开学校之后就一直呆在家里。

It is/ has been +一段时间+since从句，意为“自从……以来已经（多久）了”。
示例： It has been three months since he moved to this city. 
他搬到这个城市已经三个月了。
